tasks.title: Fix Telegram voice messaging
tasks.description: Voice messages currently crash OpenClaw. Need to investigate and fix the crash issue to make voice messaging stable and reliable.

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Root cause: OOM killer terminating gateway when whisper loads model. Server has 3.8GB RAM, no swap. Fix: switched to tiny model (73MB vs 139MB base). Config updated and gateway restarted.

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Voice message test successful! Received and transcribed without crash. Tiny model fix confirmed working.

tasks.title: Fix Voice Message Gateway Crashes
tasks.description: After 2-3 voice messages, gateway becomes unresponsive and requires restart. Investigate memory/context issues with voice message processing. CRITICAL PRIORITY.

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Updated OpenClaw from 2026.1.30 to 2026.2.2-3. This version includes fix #7475 'Media understanding: skip binary media from file text extraction' which should address the voice message context overflow issue.

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Stability test in progress: 6/10 voice messages processed successfully with no crashes. Update to 2026.2.2-3 appears to have fixed the issue.

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: STABILITY TEST PASSED: 10/10 voice messages processed successfully including a 2.5 minute stress test. Update to 2026.2.2-3 confirmed to fix the binary media context overflow issue. Ready for final approval.

tasks.title: Obsidian Integration Setup
tasks.description: Install Obsidian skill from ClawHub and send voice note explaining Obsidian basics to Anthony

comments.author: OpenClaw
comments.text: Sent voice note explaining Obsidian basics. Installed obsidian skill from ClawHub to /root/.openclaw/workspace/skills/obsidian

tasks.title: Remove Done Panel from Mission Control
tasks.description: Remove the 'done' column from Mission Control dashboard - only need backlog, in_progress, and review
